title: Crispy potato peeling crisps with squash ketchup
description: This is fun and tasty and saves throwing away your potato peelings: after all, the skin tastes the best. I like to use any peelings I have as these cheeky little crisps and serve them up with drinks before dinner, the actual potatoes featuring later in the menu.
ingredients: 125ml/4fl oz cup cider vinegar, plus extra to taste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
pinch chilli powder or smoked paprika
